creatures.name: Goblin
creatures.desc: The Goblin and the Hobgoblin are both the most basic infantry. They don't have any special attack power or abilities. They mainly rely on numbers to win, which is the same as their predecessors in the HoMM2. Although their appearance has changed, their strength is still the same. They are very vulnerable in battle. Fortunately, the speed of Hobgoblin is relatively fast, so it can take the lead, which can be regarded as a little compensation for this type of soldier! Finally, their cost is still very cheap, at least compared to the wolf rider.
creatures.desc_cn: 地精和地精怪都是最初级的基础步兵。他们没有什么特殊的攻击力和能力。主要是靠数量取胜，这点他们倒跟2代中的前辈一样，虽然样子有所变化，但其实力还是一样的菜的，在战斗中非常不禁打。好在地精怪的速度还比较快，可以抢先出手，算是对这个兵种的一点弥补吧！最后他们的造价还是很便宜的，至少和狼骑兵比起来是这样的。

creatures.name: Hobgoblin
creatures.desc: The Goblin and the Hobgoblin are both the most basic infantry. They don't have any special attack power or abilities. They mainly rely on numbers to win, which is the same as their predecessors in the HoMM2. Although their appearance has changed, their strength is still the same. They are very vulnerable in battle. Fortunately, the speed of Hobgoblin is relatively fast, so it can take the lead, which can be regarded as a little compensation for this type of soldier! Finally, their cost is still very cheap, at least compared to the wolf rider.
creatures.desc_cn: 地精和地精怪都是最初级的基础步兵。他们没有什么特殊的攻击力和能力。主要是靠数量取胜，这点他们倒跟2代中的前辈一样，虽然样子有所变化，但其实力还是一样的菜的，在战斗中非常不禁打。好在地精怪的速度还比较快，可以抢先出手，算是对这个兵种的一点弥补吧！最后他们的造价还是很便宜的，至少和狼骑兵比起来是这样的。

creatures.name: Wolf Rider
creatures.desc: Compared to the Goblin, the wolf riders are obviously much more powerful. Their bellicosity makes them particularly swift in their attacks. Wolf raiders are one of the few troops that can attack twice in a row. It is said that the best fighters in battle are good at saving and using the wolf riders.
creatures.desc_cn: 跟地精怪相比，恶狼骑士显然要厉害许多。他们的好战使他们攻击时特别迅猛。恶狼斗士是为数不多的可以连续攻击两次的部队。相传对战中的高~高手们都是善攒善用好狼骑这一奇兵的。

creatures.name: Wolf Raider
creatures.desc: Compared to the Goblin, the wolf riders are obviously much more powerful. Their bellicosity makes them particularly swift in their attacks. Wolf raiders are one of the few troops that can attack twice in a row. It is said that the best fighters in battle are good at saving and using the wolf riders.
creatures.desc_cn: 跟地精怪相比，恶狼骑士显然要厉害许多。他们的好战使他们攻击时特别迅猛。恶狼斗士是为数不多的可以连续攻击两次的部队。相传对战中的高~高手们都是善攒善用好狼骑这一奇兵的。
creatures.skills_cn: 攻击2次（第一次攻击后被反击）

creatures.name: Orc
creatures.desc: It is hard to imagine that such a rubbish and inferior soldier would appear in the 3rd level troop. It has no special skills, low attack power, and ridiculously low defense power. I really don't know why the designer put such a soldier in the 3rd level troop. If you insist on saying that he has some merits, then it can only be said that he is still a long-range attack soldier, otherwise he might not have the face to continue to mix in the Stronghold clan, right?
creatures.desc_cn: 难以想象，在三级部队中居然会出现这样垃圾，这样低劣的兵种。没有任何特技，攻击力偏低，防御力则低的离谱。真不知道设计者怎么会将这样的兵种放在三级部队中。硬要说他有可取之处的话，那就只能说他还算个远程攻击兵种，不然他自己可能也没有脸在兽人族里混下去了吧？

creatures.name: Orc Chieftain
creatures.desc: It is hard to imagine that such a rubbish and inferior soldier would appear in the 3rd level troop. It has no special skills, low attack power, and ridiculously low defense power. I really don't know why the designer put such a soldier in the 3rd level troop. If you insist on saying that he has some merits, then it can only be said that he is still a long-range attack soldier, otherwise he might not have the face to continue to mix in the Stronghold clan, right?
creatures.desc_cn: 难以想象，在三级部队中居然会出现这样垃圾，这样低劣的兵种。没有任何特技，攻击力偏低，防御力则低的离谱。真不知道设计者怎么会将这样的兵种放在三级部队中。硬要说他有可取之处的话，那就只能说他还算个远程攻击兵种，不然他自己可能也没有脸在兽人族里混下去了吧？

creatures.name: Ogre
creatures.desc: The ogre tribe with big wooden sticks has good attack and durability. They performed well in the HoMM2. In this game, the upgraded ogre mages can cast advanced bloodlust on their own troops once per round. This makes up for the problem of the slow movement speed of the ogre mage. When fighting, stand still and cast bloodlust on your own ancient species and thunderbirds (the spell lasts for 6 rounds and the effect is equivalent to advanced magic skills), and then wait for the enemy to come closer and be beaten. It's a perfect plan! The only limitation is that a group of ogre mages can only use magic three times, so you have to aim at the target!
creatures.desc_cn: 手拿大木棒的食人魔一族有着不错的攻击力和耐久力。他们在2代中就有良好的表现。而在本代中，升级后的食人魔法师可以对己方部队施高级嗜血术，每回合一次。这就很好的弥补了食人魔法师移动速度过慢的问题。在作战时站在原地给己方的古代种和雷鸟施用嗜血奇术（法术持续6回合，且效果等同高级魔法技能），然后等敌人自己走近来挨打，真是完美的计划啊！其唯一的限制是一组食人魔法师只能使用三次魔法，所以，要瞅准目标哦！

creatures.name: Ogre Mage
creatures.desc: The ogre tribe with big wooden sticks has good attack and durability. They performed well in the HoMM2. In this game, the upgraded ogre mages can cast advanced bloodlust on their own troops once per round. This makes up for the problem of the slow movement speed of the ogre mage. When fighting, stand still and cast bloodlust on your own ancient species and thunderbirds (the spell lasts for 6 rounds and the effect is equivalent to advanced magic skills), and then wait for the enemy to come closer and be beaten. It's a perfect plan! The only limitation is that a group of ogre mages can only use magic three times, so you have to aim at the target!
creatures.desc_cn: 手拿大木棒的食人魔一族有着不错的攻击力和耐久力。他们在2代中就有良好的表现。而在本代中，升级后的食人魔法师可以对己方部队施高级嗜血术，每回合一次。这就很好的弥补了食人魔法师移动速度过慢的问题。在作战时站在原地给己方的古代种和雷鸟施用嗜血奇术（法术持续6回合，且效果等同高级魔法技能），然后等敌人自己走近来挨打，真是完美的计划啊！其唯一的限制是一组食人魔法师只能使用三次魔法，所以，要瞅准目标哦！
creatures.skills_cn: 可以用嗜血魔法（中级，6回合）

creatures.name: Roc
creatures.desc: The Roc and Thunderbird are the only flying troops in the Stronghold clan, and at the same time, they are also the most cost-effective troops of this race. The balanced attack and defense, excellent speed and long life make me rate them very highly. At the same time, when the Thunderbird attacks, there is a 20% chance of generating a lightning attack, and the damage is 10× the number of Thunderbirds, which is a force that cannot be ignored. And the Roc nest can be easily built.
creatures.desc_cn: 大鹏和雷鸟是兽人族中唯一的飞行部队，同时，也是这个种族性价比最好的部队。平衡的攻防、出色的速度和耐久的生命使我对他的评价非常高。同时，当雷鸟攻击时有20%的几率会产生闪电攻击，伤害力为10×雷鸟的数量，不容忽视的力量哦。而且大鹏很容易就可以建筑出来。

creatures.name: Thunderbird
creatures.desc: The Roc and Thunderbird are the only flying troops in the Stronghold clan, and at the same time, they are also the most cost-effective troops of this race. The balanced attack and defense, excellent speed and long life make me rate them very highly. At the same time, when the Thunderbird attacks, there is a 20% chance of generating a lightning attack, and the damage is 10× the number of Thunderbirds, which is a force that cannot be ignored. And the Roc nest can be easily built.
creatures.desc_cn: 大鹏和雷鸟是兽人族中唯一的飞行部队，同时，也是这个种族性价比最好的部队。平衡的攻防、出色的速度和耐久的生命使我对他的评价非常高。同时，当雷鸟攻击时有20%的几率会产生闪电攻击，伤害力为10×雷鸟的数量，不容忽视的力量哦。而且大鹏很容易就可以建筑出来。
creatures.skills_cn: 飞行兵种，20%几率附带闪电攻击（10×雷鸟数量）

creatures.name: Cyclops
creatures.desc: The Cyclops and the Cyclops King are very strong ranged attack units. Since they throw stones, these two guys can attack city walls and arrow towers like catapults. The Cyclops has elementary ballistics skills, while the Giant King has intermediate ballistics skills. Unfortunately, although this unit can attack city walls in this game, its attack effect is discounted. It feels not as exciting as in the HoMM2. Often, a stone is thrown, but it does not achieve the expected effect, which is a bit disappointing. In addition, to build a Cyclops, you must first spend 20 wood to build an ogre, and then find 20 crystals, which makes it very difficult to build them, so most players will choose to build a roc first and then build a behemoth.
creatures.desc_cn: 独眼巨人和独眼王是相当强的远程攻击兵种。由于是投掷石头，这两个家伙都可以象投石车一样攻击城墙和箭塔。独眼巨人具有初级弹道学技巧，巨人王则有中级弹道学技巧。可惜在本代中这个兵种虽然加入了可以攻击城墙的设定，但其攻击效果却打了个折扣，感觉上使用起来没有2代那么过瘾，经常一个石头丢过去，却没有达到预想中的效果，有些令人失望。而且要建造独眼巨人必须先花费20木材造食人魔，再找来20个水晶，使得建造他们非常的困难，所以一般玩家都会先选择造大鹏再造比蒙这一路线。
creatures.skills_cn: 远程兵种。攻击城墙（相当于初级弹道术的投石车）

creatures.name: Cyclops King
creatures.desc: The Cyclops and the Cyclops King are very strong ranged attack units. Since they throw stones, these two guys can attack city walls and arrow towers like catapults. The Cyclops has elementary ballistics skills, while the Giant King has intermediate ballistics skills. Unfortunately, although this unit can attack city walls in this game, its attack effect is discounted. It feels not as exciting as in the HoMM2. Often, a stone is thrown, but it does not achieve the expected effect, which is a bit disappointing. In addition, to build a Cyclops, you must first spend 20 wood to build an ogre, and then find 20 crystals, which makes it very difficult to build them, so most players will choose to build a roc first and then build a behemoth.
creatures.desc_cn: 独眼巨人和独眼王是相当强的远程攻击兵种。由于是投掷石头，这两个家伙都可以象投石车一样攻击城墙和箭塔。独眼巨人具有初级弹道学技巧，巨人王则有中级弹道学技巧。可惜在本代中这个兵种虽然加入了可以攻击城墙的设定，但其攻击效果却打了个折扣，感觉上使用起来没有2代那么过瘾，经常一个石头丢过去，却没有达到预想中的效果，有些令人失望。而且要建造独眼巨人必须先花费20木材造食人魔，再找来20个水晶，使得建造他们非常的困难，所以一般玩家都会先选择造大鹏再造比蒙这一路线。
creatures.skills_cn: 远程兵种。攻击城墙（相当于初级弹道术的投石车）

creatures.name: Behemoth
creatures.desc:
The difference in strength between the Behemoth before and after the upgrade is quite large, from 160HP to 300HP, the difference between the Ancient Behemoth and the Behemoth is not small. Although the basic values ​​seem ordinary, the huge momentum brought by the Behemoth's huge body to its attack can greatly reduce the enemy's defense. Among them, the larvae reduce it by 40%, and the Ancient Behemoth reduce it by 80%! Don't underestimate this ability. For example, take the Archangel as an example. Its defense is originally 30 points, but when the Ancient Behemoth attacks, it becomes only 6 points because of the Ancient Behemoth's special skills! ? Add to that the Ancient Behemoth's own attack power of 19 points, then the actual attack difference is 13 points. On the other hand, the Archangel, although it has 30 points of attack power, is not bad after removing the Ancient Behemoth's 19 points of defense, and the difference is only 11 points. Therefore, this ability of the Ancient Behemoth is really a controversial topic. Generally speaking, in a one-on-one duel, I'm afraid no one dares to say that he will win except the Titan!

Due to its special skill of ignoring defense, any soldier will only have 20% defense in front of it. This effect is also reflected in the troops affected by the "All or Nothing" magic. The special skill of the Ancient Behemoth takes precedence over the magic casting effect, so when this soldier faces the Ancient Behemoth, the algorithm of the magic effect is to deduct 80% of the defense and add the remaining 20% ​​of the defense to the attack power.
creatures.desc_cn:
比蒙在升级前后实力差距相当大，从160HP到300点HP，古代比蒙和普通比蒙的差别不可谓不大。虽然基础数值看起来很一般，但巨兽的庞大身躯为其攻击带来的巨大气势却能使敌方防御力大副下降。其中，比蒙降低40%，古代比蒙降低80%！不要小看这个能力，算算这笔帐，以大天使为例，其防御力本来有30点，但在古代比蒙攻击时却因为古代比蒙的特技而变的相当于只有6点！？再加上古代比蒙本身的攻击力19点，那么实际攻击差就有13点，反观大天使，虽然有30点的攻击力，但去除古代比蒙19点防御力后也不错才11点差额而已。所以说，古代比蒙的这个能力实在是一个相当有争议的话题。一般一对一单挑的话，恐怕除了泰坦没人敢说稳胜他！

由于其忽防特技，所以任何兵种在它面前都只剩20%的防御，这个效果也同样体现在受了＂孤注一掷＂魔法影响的部队中，古代比蒙的特技是优先于魔法施放效果，所以该兵种在面对古代比蒙的时候，魔法效果的算法是扣除80%防御后剩下的20%防御加到攻击力上面去。

creatures.desc:
The difference in strength between the Behemoth before and after the upgrade is quite large, from 160HP to 300HP, the difference between the Ancient Behemoth and the Behemoth is not small.
